title: Please Identify Font
content:
Please Identify Font - been looking for ages :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821062914im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CTL%20DARK%20BLUE_6697.jpg)
author: BJohnson13

comments.content:
Not an exact match, but your logo could easily be made from this font (only $10).

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/nordic-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821062914/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/nordic-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/nordic-pro/")

Nordic Pro is an authorized update to "Nordic" with added characters and open type features. The original free font Nordic is still available [Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821062914/http:/www.dafont.com/nordic.font). - Herb
